name: jc-waterfun-resort
description: A full-stack MERN application that modernises bookings and internal operations for John Cezar Waterfun Resort._

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm start --prefix client" "npm run server --prefix server"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && npm install --prefix server

author: Darryle Miles Bacay
